content.rendered:
LOCATED ADJACENT TO STEYN CITY, THIS IS THE FIRST RESIDENTIAL DEVELOPMENT IN RIVERSANDS

The Parks Lifestyle Apartments @ Riversands is a stunning residential development consisting of 1960 bachelor, one, two and three-bed apartments. The new Estate by Century Property Developments offers the ideal rental apartment to residents looking for a convenient, secure and value for money lifestyle located in the fast-growing Riversands development. The development boasts a secure gatehouse manned 24/7 as well as a clubhouse with braai facilities, tennis courts, swimming pool, outdoor gym equipment, walking trails and children’s play areas.

Contact Thato
Contact Thobile
Contact Dineo
Contact Brian
Contact Glenorah
Contact Bukiso
BROCHURE
ESTATE RULES
ESTATE VIDEO
MEET THE NEIGHBOURS
ESTATE LOCATION

ESTATE FEATURES

Bachelor, 1-bed, 2-bed and 3-bed apartments to rent
Sizes range from 33m² – 74m²
Rent from R5,600pm – R10,900pm
Modern open plan layouts with quality finishes
Tight security with biometric fingerprint access
Best value for money lifestyle in the Fourways area
Close proximity to retail centres like the new Makro store
Free internet in each apartment
Care-free living as maintenance is included
Free weekly activities and social events for kids and adults
Early Learning Centre
SPARK School Riversands
(Future) High School

OUTDOOR FACILITIES

Walking Trails/Paths
Children’s Play Parks
Braai Facilities
Tennis Court – FREE Weekly Classes
Swimming Pool
Soccer Fields
Multipurpose Sports Fields
Super Splash Water Park
Bike Track

INDOOR FACILITIES

Family Restaurant
Double-storey Gym – FREE Weekly Classes
Cocktail Bar
Meeting Rooms
Cinema
Games Room
Laundromat
Convenience Store

TAKE A LOOK AT SOME OF OUR LAYOUTS BELOW

THE PARKS @ RIVERSANDS IS ON SHOW 7 DAYS A WEEK FROM 9:00 UNTIL 17:00
